IRS990.MissionDescription: North Yarmouth Academy is an independent, college preparatory, coeducational day school serving students in grades six through twelve. The school offers a structured program that sets clear standards and high expectations in an environment that emphasizes values of mutual respect, trust and community. North Yarmouth Academy is dedicated to fostering integrity, character and intellect in young adults.
IRS990.Description: The Academy operates a private secondary day school in Yarmouth, Maine with 295 students from grades six through twelve.The North Yarmouth Academy program encourages students to develop:1. Problem-solving skills based on sound analytical and creative thought2. Sophistication in writing, speaking and artistic expression3. Appreciation for the importance of athletic activity, teamwork and cooperation4. Self-confidence and self-respect through a breadth of experiences that extend beyond the classroom5. Concern for the larger community and an appreciation for the natural environment6. Desire to continue the process of lifelong learning

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Intended uses of endowment funds include capital improvements, scholarships, faculty enrichment, diversity, and other various mission-related purposes.
Change in Value of Deferred Gifts: 2716. Change in the Present Value Discount: 10006.
Rental Expense: 188612. Fundraising Expense: 23052. Change in Value of Deferred Gifts: 2716. Change in the Present Value Discount: 10006.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: The racially nondiscriminatory policy is printed in all advertising and promotional materials.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: All financial aid is credited directly to the students account balances.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: The housing allowance is part of the employment contract. Travel for companions is provided as a stipend for performing support duties associated with the school including attending off campus school related meetings.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A draft Form 990 is reviewed by the school's CFO to assure a proper reconciliation between the audited financials and the 990 format. Once the draft is approved by the CFO, the CFO then reviews it with the Board Treasurer who subsequently signs the return after the review process is complete.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Headmaster's compensation is determined by a compensation review committee (made up of the board's officers). They use comparative data supplied by NAIS, ISANNA and Carney Sandoe.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: North Yarmouth Academy makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy and financial statements available to the public upon appropriate request.
The audit process has not changed from the prior year.
John Kauffman is a former board member.
